Articles.Content:
Hi, I played the demo for KSP and I absolutey loved it. I should've purchased it when it was 13,99$ on Steam, but didn't, due to the fact that I hadn't tried out the game back then.

Now we're in the Steam summer sales, but they are coming to an end, and Kerbal still has not been on sale..

So I thought going to G2A, where to game is 9$, if redeemed on GOG.

Should I buy from G2A? The price is really interesting but I never bought from there.

Any suggestions are more than welcome, can't wait to join the community!
Go for it. I thought GOG was only something like 25% off ($30?). $9 would be *very* cheap for the US, but other areas have different pricing.
Check reviews at the bottom. Some sites don't give you the key immediately
